title: Pillar of rime
data:
***[Trunk](/Trunk "Trunk")-only**: This article pertains to a feature of Crawl which is being tested. It will likely change before the next release, and may even be removed entirely.*

- *This page is a **[stub](/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. You could probably [expand this page](http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Pillar_of_rime\&action=edit) should you wish to do so.*

| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A spire of strangely tenebrous ice, its brittle tendrils reaching skyward like the fingers of an outstretched hand.If only the dying breath of every soul could create such art.\<OR, if you haven't memorized Rimeblight,>It might even be beautiful if you didn't know the gruesome way it formed. |

## Useful Info

**Pillars of rime** are created when you kill enemies with the [Rimeblight](/Rimeblight "Rimeblight") spell.

## Tips & Tricks

## History

- In [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), pillars of rime will be added to the game as a part of the [Rimeblight](/Rimeblight "Rimeblight") spell.
html:
Pillar of rime

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Trunk-only: This article pertains to a feature of Crawl which is being tested. It will likely change before the next release, and may even be removed entirely.
This page is a stub. You could probably expand this page should you wish to do so.
pillar of rime I 
HP 24-50
HD 3
XP 0
Speed 10 (stationary)
AC 15
EV 0
Will Immune



Resistances rC+++
rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Fire
Habitat Land
Intelligence Brainless
Uses Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Non-living
Size Medium
Type pillar of rime, pillar of rime
Flags Stationary
No experience gain
Harmless
A spire of strangely tenebrous ice, its brittle tendrils reaching skyward like the fingers of an outstretched hand.

If only the dying breath of every soul could create such art.

<OR, if you haven't memorized Rimeblight,>

It might even be beautiful if you didn't know the gruesome way it formed.

Useful Info

Pillars of rime are created when you kill enemies with the Rimeblight spell.

Tips & Tricks

History

  • In 0.32, pillars of rime will be added to the game as a part of the Rimeblight spell.
